Lexar x Eyes of a Nomad

Collaboration Proposal

Hey Lexar.
I love your brand, and think we could make some magic together.

Let me introduce myself.


@eyesofanomad


Photograher | Videographer | Content Creator | Adventurer | Teacher

I'm Emilio, aka Eyes of a Nomad

I'm a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.

I split my time between travelling the world, doing photography & videography for brands, and teaching the next generation of content creators through my school the Institute of Code.

I'm also currently creating an online photography course that will teach students from all over the world how to take epic photos & edit them in Lightroom and Photoshop, which is launching mid 2019.

My Audience

Every single day I have people asking my advice for the perfect photography workflow -- whether it's followers on instagram, students at Institute of Code, or fellow content creators on group trips. I'm always seeking and sharing the latest tools to make life as a photographer easier, and when I find brands that I love, I can't talk about them enough.

My audience is predominately aspiring photographers, influencers and content creators. It's a premium audience that like to invest in quality (our course is a $4.5k investment), believe in the value of community, and generally love travel and adventure.

I've worked with some pretty amazing brands

I've worked with local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. My work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams. Just a few brands that I've worked with include...

  • The Mulia Resort
  • Pared Sunglasses
  • La Lunia Liveaboad (Luxury Komodo Cruises)
  • Magali Pascal
  • Bricks Milano
  • Ark Swimwear
  • Mimpi Mattress
  • Uluwatu Surf Villas
  • Allie Ayers (Sports Illustrated Model)

Engagement Rate

I know my audience would love the newest Lexar range, let's share it with them.

Objective

I want to help you foster a community of content creators who recognise Lexar as the go-to brand for every photographer, and position it as the ultimate storage solution. My followers look to me as a source of information for all things photography, and I really believe that Lexar offers a superior workflow for professionals when utilising multiple products together.

My Pitch

While I'm open adapting a campaign to your goals and current promotional needs, I would love to offer you ...

  • 10x high resolution professionally edited photos showcasing the Lexar products
  • 1 minute professional video showcasing the professional workflow shared on my instagram story
  • inclusion in a 'Gear Guide for Photographers' on www.instituteofcode.com blog
  • mention in 3 separate instagram stories over the next 3 months
  • 1x feature an instagram post with detailed caption about the product
  • include your products in our recommended purchase list for students of my in-person and online courses

In the interest of starting a long term relationship, I'm open to offering all this at no monetary cost just in exchange for gifting the products that I would review / promote...

  • Lexar Professional Workflow Hub + 1x portable SSD Drive + 3x card readers
  • 256GB Lexar Professional 1066x CompactFlash card (for Photo)
  • 256GB Lexar Professional 2000x SDHC/SDXC UHS-II card (for Video)
  • 128GB Lexar Professional 1800x microSDXC UHS-II card (for Drone)

Why I think we're the perfect fit.

To me, Lexar is a company that is dedicated to quality and I really believe that professional photographers need to invest in professional equipment.

In 2019 I'll be teaching hundreds of students photography through IOC & my online courses -- people who are looking to invest in their career as a photographer or content creator.

Slide into my inbox

Keen to chat further? Send me an email and let's get the ball rolling.
